name: json-convert
label: JC - Parse Command Output
description: Convert the output of many commands and file-types to structured objects using the open-source JSON Convert (JC) library. The JC project details can be found at https://github.com/kellyjonbrazil/jc

operations.title: Convert
operations.description: Convert command or file output to a Dict or List of Dicts.

parameters.title: JC Parser
parameters.description: Select the correct parser to be used to convert the command or file output. Documentation for parsers can be found at https://github.com/kellyjonbrazil/jc#parsers.
parameters.name: parser

parameters.title: Command or File Output to Parse
parameters.description: Enter the text string of the command or file output to be converted to a Dict or List of Dicts.
parameters.name: command_output

parameters.title: Raw Output
parameters.description: An unprocessed conversion that will typically not include int, float, or bool conversions. Also will not include additional calculated fields in the output. (e.g. timestamps)
parameters.name: raw

operations.title: Get Parser List
operations.description: Get the list of standard parsers available in this version of JC. The full parser list can be found at https://github.com/kellyjonbrazil/jc#parsers.
